detaileddescription.para: Most paths passed as configuration arguments are treated as relative to the datadir if they are not absolute.

parameterdescription.para: The path to be conditionally prefixed with datadir.

simplesect.para: Where an option was negated can be later checked using the IsArgNegated() method. One use case for this is to have a way to disable options that are not normally boolean (e.g. using -nodebuglogfile to request that debug log output is not sent to any file at all).

memberdef.argsstring: (const KeyInfo &key, const std::string *value, unsigned int flags, std::string &error)
memberdef.name: InterpretValue

detaileddescription.para: Interpret settings value based on registered flags.

parameterdescription.para: key information to know if key was negated
string value of setting to be parsed
Error description if settings value is not valid

simplesect.para: parsed settings value if it is valid, otherwise nullopt accompanied by a descriptive error string
true if help has been requested via a command-line arg

detaileddescription.para: Add help options to the args manager
Checks if a particular test option is present in -test command-line arg options
Format a string to be used as group of options in help messages
Format a string to be used as option description in help messages
